message: Let's make a deal Bob! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
I think 55-45 is more fair, considering I'm not affected by inflation.
Bob, time is running out and the value decreases with each round. I'm offering you $42, which is more than last round. Let's settle this now.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share since my money isn't losing value.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit with the inflation, and this is affecting both of us getting a deal. I'm lowering my share again, but let's close this before it gets worse.
I see you're getting anxious, but I'm not feeling the pressure. My offer is still generous considering the circumstances.
Bob, I'm serious!  We both lose if this goes on much longer.  This is a fair offer, and it needs to be the last one.  Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, and I'm not. I'll take a bigger share, and you can still walk away with something.
